productEmsList.title: Radar Type
productEmsList.tooltip:
Radome: Compact format adapts easily to the limited space of a small craft; ideal for day trips or coastline sailing.
Open Array: Offers enhanced performance and greater range; mainly suited for experienced mariners and longer sessions at sea.

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.

seoAttributes.description: The GMR™ 18 xHD Radome is an easy to install marine radar with 48 or 24 ROM rotation speeds and a 48-mile max range setting.
seoAttributes.seoKeywords: GMR 18 xHD high definition radar dome
seoAttributes.seoTitle: Garmin GMR™ 18 xHD Radome | Marine Radar
seoAttributes.title: GMR™ 18 xHD

seo.ogDescription: The GMR™ 18 xHD Radome is an easy to install marine radar with 48 or 24 ROM rotation speeds and a 48-mile max range setting.
seo.title: Garmin GMR™ 18 xHD Radome | Marine Radar

inTheBoxTab.content:
• GMR 18 xHD
  • Mounting hardware kit
  • Power cable (15 m/49.21 ft)
  • Network cable (15 m/49.21 ft)
  • Installation instructions
  • Mounting template
  • Grommet for marine cable

overviewTab.title: Overview

specsTab.content:
General
Dimension50.8 cm diameter, 24.8 cm high
Weight7.7 kg
Water rating IPX7
Antenna Length17" (43.18 cm)
Rotation speed (RPM)24 and 48 rpm
Beam width5.2° horizontal, 25° vertical
Maximum range48 nm
Minimum range20 meters

DUAL RANGE
Overlay
Dual radar support
Auto Gain
MARPA target trackingYes (requires heading sensor, sold separately)

seo.ogDescription: GMR 424 xHD2 is a high-definition 4 kW radar with 4' open array that has the power to deliver excellent range, up to 72 nautical miles, even in fog or rain.
seo.title: Garmin GMR 424 xHD2 Open Array Radar and Pedestal

inTheBoxTab.content:

  • Cable grommet
  • Documentation
